title: Dream7.Home.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot1>>
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController opening>>
[Redacted]: ...
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController frontdooropens>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot5>>
[Redacted]: ...
[Redacted]: Emma can you..
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot3>>
[Redacted]: can you get me something in the cellar?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot5>>
Emma: yeah, what do you need?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot4>>
[Redacted]: ...we need bread
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController emmaenterscellar>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot6>>
Emma: ok...
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController doorclosesonemma>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot7>>
Emma: ...
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController emmaatcloseddoor>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot8>>
Emma: Hey, the door won't open. 
Emma: Hello? the door's stuck
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot7>>
[Redacted]: It's not stuck
[Redacted]: ...Emma it's time. 
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController bothstruggleatdoor>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot9>>
Emma: No! Let me out!
Emma: ...But, the harvest this year
Emma: I thought we made more than we did last year
Emma: why are you selling me?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot10>>
[Redacted]: We did, except
[Redacted]: our farm can never make enough
[Redacted]: even if grain prices doubled every year
[Redacted]: it wouldn't be enough
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot9>>
Emma: What?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot10>>
[Redacted]: We had to lie to you
[Redacted]: the debt this community is under has lasted for...
[Redacted]: generations
[Redacted]: before you, before me.
[Redacted]: you aren't our first Emma
[Redacted]: and you won't be our last.
[Redacted]: Thats why we had you and Annabelle in the first place...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot9>>
Emma: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot13>>
Emma: Annabelle! Run!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot11>>
Emma: Run! Get away!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot12>>
Emma: They're coming to take us!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot10>>
[Redacted]: No!
[Redacted]: God damn it Emma.
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController Shot14>>
Emma: ...so all this was for nothing
Emma: what am I to this world?
Emma: a mass of flesh and bone
Emma: turned into money
Emma: the most useless thing in the world
<<returnToCampScene SceneShotController>>
